          <title>
            <string language="en">The structure of matter - Water molecules</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Struktur des Stoffes - Wassermoleküle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La structure de la matière - molécules d'eau</string>

            <string language="x-mt-it">La struttura della materia - molecole di acqua</string>

            <string language="x-mt-es">La estructura de la materia - moléculas de agua</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation of the movement of water molecules . demonstrates the structure of water molecules.</string>
          </description>

          </description>

          </description>

καταδεικνύει τη δομή των μορίων ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación del movimiento de las moléculas 
de agua. demuestra la estructura de las moléculas de agua.</string>
